text.text_translated:
Feedback is when you tell someone how they did.  
Do not always add a negative comment after a good comment.  
When a good comment, then a bad one follows.  
The good words are not needed anymore.  
The good comment can be ignored.  
Make sure you sometimes give a good comment on its own.  
Do not give ways to do better right after the good comment.

Do not always add a negative feedback after a positive feedback.
